name: Optimus
overview:
Optimus Corporation designs, develops, and delivers information technology tools and services. The company provides systems engineering solutions, which include the research, development, design, and execution of navaid, defense, and communication engineering systems; system analysis, design, development, testing, and implementation of Windows and Web-enabled applications using Visual Studio .Net, ASP, and SQL Server technologies; business process analysis and development of system objectives, stakeholder management, analysis, documentation, and configuration management; and user and systems documentation and specification development.

The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in McLean, Virginia. Optimus Corporation operates as a subsidiary of AVIEL Systems, Inc.
